subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: DETROIT (AP) — Pavel Datsyuk, Henrik Zetterberg and Jiri Hudler scored in a shootout Monday night to lift the Detroit Red Wings to a 4-3 victory over the Washington Capitals.
snippet: DETROIT (AP) — Pavel Datsyuk, Henrik Zetterberg and Jiri Hudler scored in a shootout Monday night to lift the Detroit Red Wings to a 4-3 victory over the Washington Capitals.
